subject: Simsonn Shipping Confirmed #SSN4164
description_text: We apologize, but the base plates are currently out of stock at our German warehouse. We have shipped them to you from China, and customs duties are now required. Please provide us with the invoice after paying the duties, and we will reimburse you for a portion of the amount. Here is your logistics link.  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1Z144AW70423971765/trackdetails

conversations.body_text:

I hope work with you next Time.
Very thanks
Steeve Parriche
